title: (27600) Sarria - Plaza San Roque
description: Small and really safe parking opposite a chapel. Ideal if you would like start your way to Santiago de Compostela and need somewhere let your car.

title: (27600) Sarria - 23 Rúa do Castelo
description: Parking space on top of hill from Sarria. Camina de Santiago passes at 50 m. Plenty space. 2 min walk to old town.

title: (27600) Sarria - 18 Rúa Curros Enríquez
description: Nice place to park. Next to a sports center and a restaurant. Possibility to walk to the river.

title: (27600) Sarria - 14 Rúa Castelao
description: The gates of the city, a free service area with parking for the night, not great, quiet but correct.

title: (27619) Sarria - 3 Camiño de Pintin
description: Nice and quiet place near the campsite of Sarria (300 meters), at the foot of the Camino de Santiago, picnic tables, drinking fountain and fantastic shade. Ideal for a stop along the way. The Area is also close but it does not have shadows so, on hot days, it is better to go at sunset

name: Camping Vila de Sarria
title: (27619) Camping Vila de Sarria
description: Camping, 61 plots of 60m2 to 100m2, with electricity and water connection located in an autochthonous oak grove that gives natural shade to 100% of them and with a grass mat that covers the entire parcel land. Restaurant, The restaurant is a spacious, warm and bright place with large terraces and perfectly integrated into nature. With leisure and outdoor fun areas for the little ones sheltered from danger, making it an ideal place to enjoy with the family.

title: (27610) Castelo - LU-663
description: Old paved road, a bit of a slope. No services. For 1 night.

title: (27635) Lugo - LU-633
description: Drinking water fountain at a crossing of two country roads. The water tastes very good and refilling is very quick.

title: (27628) Teiguín - LU-633
description: Recreational rest area for pilgrims on the French Way. With shadows and picnic area. Pool very close and river with crystal clear waters. We spent the afternoon and evening with no problems. Although it is close to the road we have not been disturbed by traffic.

title: (27364) O Páramo - 26 LU-P-4304
description: A place to stop to sleep/rest/eat, in the shade almost all day, close to the road but with little traffic

title: (27620) Samos - 45 Avenida Compostela
description: Large car park next to the river, perfect for visiting Samos and its Monastery. Overnight possible with all the services of a town

title: (27611) Paradela - 44 LU-633
description: Old disused road in bottom end without exit. tarred and overlooking the valley. To spend 1 quiet night in a van, complicated half-round by camper.

title: (27163) Carretera - Unnamed Road
description: Small station with parking space perfect for a night on the way, tranquility assured

title: (27367) Láncara - Rúa Vilasantán
description: Picnic area with tables, games and coals. There is a river and a bridge. Shaded area.

title: (27611) Paradela, Lugo - 45 LU-633
description: picnic area.

title: (27345) Outeiro - 13D Lugar Outeiro
description: Reservoir of Vilasouto. Quiet place, surrounded by nature. Perfect to spend the night and spend the day. Swimming area, picnic tables, trash can, source of drinking water and signposted hiking trail, which surrounds the reservoir.

title: (27611) Paradela - LU-633
description: Superb Picnic area with a mountain view. 2 tables are at your disposal and a trash can.

title: (27611) Paradela - LU-P-4201
description: A parking area with some flat area. Resource in case nothing else is found in the area.

title: (27630) Triacastela -
description: We did not stay here. but you could. one semi flat parking spot right next to an ancient unoccupied chapel. incredible views around of mountains. no cell phone reception. no services around. just a mirador/lookout you can drive then walk to. only smaller vans, big campers not recommended

title: (27346) O Incio - 1 Camino Moa
description: Emptying of black and gray water, and filling with water. There is a large parking area in a small square in the town. Very quiet, surrounded by nature and with services next door: supermarket, bars, playground, etc.

title: (27630) Triacastela - 3 Praza da Deputación
description: Small rest area close to the road but little traffic we spent a quiet night. Shaded with picnic table and trash can. Our presence did not seem to bother anyone since the tourist office even came to take a picture of us for their website because the area has just been created.

title: (27630) Triacastela - 9 Praza da Deputación
description: Really easy access drinking water tap , you can park right next to it and attach tap to fill your camper tank.

title: (27630) Triacastela - 1 Praza da Deputación
description: Parking in the small town on the Camino Frances (French way). We spend the night, calm and no problems.

title: (27346) Incio - LU-P-4706
description: Large and calm parking space, easy accessible, close to city center of O Incio which has bakery, market, bars, and autocaravan service. Stunning view over the valley. Bin is in front of the cemmetary and soccer field. Some dogs barking in the neighberhood during the night.

title: (27630) Triacastela - 2D Rúa Santiago
description: Self service laundry parking available nearby.

title: (27630) Triacastela - 7 LU-P-6201
description: Parquin del centro de Salud Triacastela, tranquilisimo, hay farolas.se oyen grillos y autillos

name: Casa Rural Santa Mariña
title: (27170) Casa Rural Santa Mariña
description: Casa Rural Santa Mariña. By the river and on the way to St. Jacques. Beautiful landscape, but relatively expensive.

title: (27611) Portomarín - 10 Lugar Loio
description: Superb spot by the river. Swimming with restaurant 50m away. Level ground but could get busy at weekend.

title: (27170) Portomarín - 20 Rúa do Miño
description: Baleirado area of black waters and with taps for loading water.

title: (27170) Portomarín - 2 Avenida Sarria
description: Quiet place. ONC-out point. French from Santiago. Views of the reservoir.

title: (27611) - 1D Lugar San Martiño
description: Peaceful place with a superb view of the valley (alt 520 m), no service but tranquility assured and visit of the church as a bonus 3 places for vans without problem but impossible access to motorhomes

title: (27680) Baralla - Autovía del Noroeste
description: Rest area next to the highway. It is high so you do not hear cars too much. Ample parking, picnic area and children's area. Ideal to make a stop to rest

title: (27170) Portomarín - LU-612
description: Nice quiet place in the forest, nothing more. We had a good night here and the dog was able to explore the forest. Nobody came by. Coming from Portomarin turn right into a forest path. Take trash with you!

title: (27164) Corgo - 13 LU-P-1604
description: Found this place by accident. there's nothing else nearby to picknick or take a rest. there is a water tap with heavy pressure. nice shade. you can hear the highway far away

title: (27611) Santa Marta - Unnamed Road
description: Cabo de Vila viewpoint with a couple of tables

title: (27178) Portomarín - Unnamed Road
description: Large flat space along a small road overlooking Rio Mino. Nice view behind the brooms No problem of height or length here but do not come by the small road along the river if you have a big vehicle.

title: (27178) - 6C Lugar Sabadelle
description: Mirador de la Buqueira. A tiny place for a van but overlooking the river with superb panorama. Accessible from Portomarin or at the other end of the narrow and winding road. For small vehicles only. Not recommended for long or wide motorhomes.

title: (27164) Corgo - 4 CP 16-11
description: Repsol service area with availability of hot water

title: (27680) Baralla - 50 Lugar Calvela
description: Shaded spot close to the 4 lane along a small road with plenty of spaces. Perfect to stop eating. No services.

title: (27680) Baralla - 110 Rúa Evaristo Correa Calderón
description:
Park/picnic area with a small river. Some benches, grass, water fountain and trash. Not so much shade.
Small playground for kids, too.

title: (27680) Baralla - 87 Rúa Evaristo Correa Calderón
description: Self-service laundry very close to the motorhome area and with a large esplanade for parking. In front of the gas station

title: (27680) Baralla - 121 Rúa Fabeiro
description: Free public motorhome service area next to the recreation area

title: (27178) Portomarín - Unnamed Road
description: For Sunday adventurers, accessible from Portomarin with a 7m motorhome, a little difficult to access because very narrow in places, U-turn possible a little further. Super quiet and peaceful but no service.

title: (27002) Lugo - LU-P-2904
description: At the edge of a quiet and isolated road a staircase leads to a charming corner of the river. Very clean (we picked up 2 garbage bags).

title: (27169) O Corgo - Autovía del Noroeste
description: Chamoso river beach in O Corgo. Green space to take a break, with tables and a bathroom area. Outside shower. Next to a restaurant-brasserie with a swimming pool.

title: (27163) O Corgo - Autovía del Noroeste
description: CEPSA gas station, fill and empty water and place for the night

title: (27163) Corgo - Autovía del Noroeste
description: Motorway rest area, 3 parking spaces for campers

title: (27339) A Pobra do Brollón - Unnamed Road
title_short: (27339) A Pobra do Brollón - Unnamed Road
description: Access of the last kilometers on a dirt road through which it is easy to pass. When you arrive, you have one source two exits. There are several stone tables in two places, there is also a chapel and a viewpoint that is accessed after a walking route of less than 2 km, a sign informs you. After a few meters, a river passes where there are even more wooden tables. It is important to have containers to throw garbage generated. Thank you for cleaning up behind you.

title: (27640) Becerreá - 98 Avenida Madrid
description: Pinic area with tables and a park there is ideal shade if you go with doggies and children ... in plan stop to rest and eat something ... there is a barbecue in the park. ..there is capacity for few cars, good motorhome access ... there is a booth I suppose they will be bathrooms but they were closed .. about 500m. gas station ... and near motorhome area.

title: (27004) Chao -
description: Quiet place by the river. Better to spend the night here than in the middle of the city. For Transporter type campers, the rest would not fit for the last stretch of the road, but there are a couple of places in the picnic area that could even fit a medium AC. We've been alone and there doesn't seem to be much movement. JE3L

title: (27640) Becerreá - Parque Empresarial
description:
Area pf caming-cars.

Departure point to the Ancares Natural Park. It also has its own natural spaces, among which are the banks of the Navia river with several fishing grounds; The bridges of Cruzul and Gatín, the Monastery of Santa Maria de Penamaior and the routes of Pena do Pico.

title: (27332) A Pobra do Brollón - 5 LU-653
description: Area for municipal motorhome, you can spend the night without problem in the village.

title: (27678) A Balsa - 50 Lugar Balsa
description: Area with tables and benches next to the forest. In wild nature. They can park several cars or motorhomes. Very nice and quiet. At the foot of the road.

title: (27324) -
description: Perfect place to spend the night sheltered by a pine forest. With good access for small vans or 4x4. Flat and with room for about 15 places. 10min from Seoane (town with bars, restaurants and supermarkets) Beautiful views of the valley going up the hill.

title: (27294) - 19 Lugar Cima de Vila
description: Free parking day and night, property of the gas station, free water filling service, perfect for large and small motorhomes very close to the city of Lugo (5 kms) they offer breakfast from 07:00 and good food service and cheap, terrace, as a rule I recommend refueling gasoline for the free services offered. It has gas refills and cepsa butane propane bottles. Quiet place for the night without noise. It has no shadow. EN "To Pontebranca"

title: (27668) Becerreá - LU-P-0703
description: Picnic area, with fountain and tables. Large esplanade, good views. And not very quiet. 3 km from the town (Becerrea)

title: (27676) As Nogais - 93 Lugar Doncos
description: Beautiful viewpoint with parking on the side of the road. Without being stuck because there is a mountain in between. Beautiful route to the castle. Near the point of emptying of water and toilet, in as nogais.

title: (27002) Lugo - Km 498 N-VI
description: Quiet public parking and there is a security guard in the pavilion

title: (27546) A Cruz - 25A Lugar Cruz
description: Quiet area at the end of the village, near the Abuime Dolmen. Flat terrain and very clean area

title: (27211) Guntín - 37 Lugar Guntin
description: Aire de Guntin has a free electric capacity for 4 places and a picnic area both within walking distance of a river. Turn right from the motorhome and walk down the road. Take the first road on the right and follow it for a few minutes to the centre. Gas station, snack-shop (stop-bar) and restaurant a 5-minute walk from the camper place. Great 11 euro daily menu in restaurant/hotel. The Stop Bar next to the petrol station has drinks, snacks/pizzas/sandwiches, fries and is very modern. Huge store just down the road from the gas station with food, wine, shoes, anything you could want. We walked along the river there you will find some old walls. Children's play area opposite restaurant in the village. Swimming pool 2 minutes drive from the camper place. Thank you to the council for such great, free facilities - please support the local shops/bars - people are very welcoming.

title: (27677) As Nogais - s/n, Viaducto S. André
title_short: (27677) As Nogais - s/n, Viaducto S. André
description:
Municipal area with 6 specific places for Acs, although you can also park / stay right next door, in the parking lot of the sports center and in the village. It also has barbecues and public swimming pool.
Gas station, hotel and shopping services are in the town center. Highly recommended for visiting the Ancares

title: (27325) Folgoso do Courel - LU-P-1306
description: Place where you can spend the night quietly, although you can not camp because the environment belongs to the natural network. There are no services, no water but there is coverage and it is a wide and flat area near the road.

title: (27410) A Ponte - 6 Lugar Outeiriño
description: It is a picnic area with a small parking lot next to a stream. Quiet place to spend the night.

title: (27002) Lugo - Paseo dos Estudantes
description: Quiet and secure parking.

title: (27002) Lugo - 150 Rúa Montirón

title: (27002) Lugo - 152 Rúa Montirón
description: Along the north-side of Rúa Montirón there are approximately 6 spaces that the municipality allows overnight parking.

title: (27002) Lugo - 44 Rúa Virxe da Esperanza
description: Place with a lot of parking, open area but very central, entertainment venues nearby, buses to the center. Near the Local Police. Very good site without problems.

title: (27325) Folgoso do Courel - 3 LU-P-1306
description: Small area of land next to a perfect reservoir. Room for one or two camper. Pass the road nearby.

title: (27002) Lugo - 22 Avenida Ramón Ferreiro
description: The car parks, we sleep during the festivities of arde lucus, quiet place and close to the holidays.

title: (27004) Lugo - 22 Paseo Álvaro Cunqueiro

title: (27004) Lugo - Paseo Fluvial
description: Quiet parking area near the Miño River, to share the parking of the vehicles.

title: (27325) Folgoso do Courel - LU-651

title: (27004) Lugo -
description: drinking fountain

Motorhome area, 15 minutes walk from the city center.
Attention, in September the zone does not exist, since, for the festivities of the city, it is totally occupied by the carnies.

title: (27004) Lugo - Acceso Complexo Deportivo Palomar

name: Acampamento O Caurel
title: (27324) Acampamento O Caurel
description:
Super quiet campsite to spend a couple of nights, lots of shade and very friendly people, ideal to make the surrounding routes or ravines

Max 6m.

title: (27550) Taboada - Barrio de Pacios
description: Location in the middle of nature. Tables available. In summer, free swimming pool. You can enjoy the facilities (toilets and showers) during the opening hours of the pool. I did not spend the night but it should not be a problem. Thanks to the common taboada.

title: (27001) Lugo - Rúa Ánxel Fole
description: Paid parking downtown with 8 seats reserved for CC. not seen services.

title: (27540) ESCAIRÓN - 1 Praza de España
description: Free parking, just behind Escairon town hall, there is a picnic area, a municipal swimming pool, public baths and a bakery and bars, a hotel or a very good store with Russian economic food. It is a small town with a lot of tranquility, ideal for spending the night.

title: (27540) Vilasante - 6 Rúa Méndez Núñez
description: Parking of the health center, next to a park with tables and fountain. Quiet

title: (27120) Castroverde - 27 Rúa Campo da Feira

Area, free next to the municipal summer pool, next to a park with swings, tables, barbecues, 3 points of light inside the public bathrooms, it is next to the town.
Bars, restaurant, supermarket, laundry, health center.
Route to the viewpoint and the castle.
Fair and Octopus alternative Sundays.

title: (27004) Lugo - 1 LU-P-2902
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (27003) Lugo - 12 Rúa Alta
description: Parking at a commercial station, no explicit restriction, suitable only for vehicles of 6m or less (personal judgment)

title: (27297) Lugo - 22 Rua Río Sil

title: (27324) Folgoso do Courel - Unnamed Road

title_short: (27400) Monforte de Lemos - Ronda de María Emilia Casas Baamonde
description: Parking and water. Very quiet and well located. Watch out for the route given by the GPS. The best direction is “Conservatorio de Música”.

address.street: Ronda de María Emilia Casas Baamonde

title: (27400) Monforte de Lemos - 306 LU-617
description: Small dirt road / pebbles, difficult to access for large camper. But doable in van or 4x4. 1 or 2 seats maximum very very quiet. Perfect for lunch or maybe at night

title: (27594) Saviñao -

title: (27297) Lugo - Avenida Infanta Elena

title_short: (27400) Monforte de Lemos - 64 Rúa dos Irmandiños
description: Nice, quiet and large parking lot. We stopped there to rest but it seems like a place where you could spend the night.

title: (27325) Folgoso do Courel - LU-651
description: Place they equip for parking motorhomes. Area paved with gray water. Place with picnic tables. Located in the heart of the chestnut forest, very close to the town of Santa Eufemia do Caurel. In the city there is a bar-boutique Pepe. There is also a woodworker and nearby hiking, mountain biking or road cycling routes

title: (27130) Baleira - s/n Avenida Doctor Escobar
description: Quiet parking area, we spend night without problem and no noise.

title: (27516) Chantada - Unnamed Road
description: Charming place to get lost in nature, next to the reservoir with the possibility of bathing, I don't know if they allow you to spend the night but because of the pints there shouldn't be any problem.

title_short: (27400) Monforte de Lemos - Rúa Cardenal Rodrigo de Castro

title: (27671) Liñares -
description: Good place to spend a night. Although the place is next to the road, the mound that separates it from the road allows you not to be seen. Very close to the town of O Cebreiro.

title: (27296) Lugo - 14 Avenida Marques de Ombreiro
description: Quiet, green area, with shade, and with space to play children and dogs (it has 2 soccer fields). There are 2 or 3 picnic tables. There is no service. If you have a vehicle taller than 3 meters, watch out for the trees.

title: (27297) Adai - 7 Lugar Adai
description: Quiet picnic area surrounded by nature. There is a very large stone table that lacks a bench, a good tree that provides shade in the morning and at noon, it is next to the road.

title: (27420) Monforte de Lemos - 48 Rúa Cobas
description: Parking next to the river with 30 spaces. It is flat and it is in a quiet area next to the river promenade, dog walking area, sports, people on bikes...

title: (27297) Lugo - Carretera de Lugo
description: AS Termas shopping center, ample parking to quietly buy and fill the pantry, as well as continuous buses that take you to the city center.

title: (27671) Pedrafita do Cebreiro - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with tables (has 13), shaded, swings, side of a quiet road area. 20 or 30 parking spaces.

title: (27297) Lugo - 1 Rúa dos Carros
description: Parking with scale for weighing your motorhome

title: (27671) O Cebreiro - 4D Lugar Cebreiro
description: Lookout / parking

title: (27671) O Cebreiro - 16 Lugar Cebreiro
description: Suitable for AC or camper of maximum 6 meters.

title: (27548) Cuñas - 58 Lugar Lama
description: Good place to park, and even to spend the night, maximum 3 motorhomes. Nice views at night on weekends and summer time, at 100 MTS in Labidegas it has afther hours. quiet place

title: (27671) Pedrafita do Cebreiro - LU-633
description: Parking with beautiful views. Amazing place, beautiful village of pilgrims step. A unique place. Very advisable

title: (27548) Cuñas - LU-P-5819
description: This is the lower shaded car park at Praia da Coba. It's next to the beach and restaurant busy by day  but quiet at night. It is on the road but few cars pass after closing hours. Discretion required if staying overnight. Beautiful swimming spot with beach. Neither the access road (very steep and narrow) nor the parking places (large car size and closely spaced) are suitable for large motorhomes. We did it in a VW T6.

title: (27297) Lugo - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful area near the fortnightly town of Lugo. Good shade and pretty scenery. Possibilities of mountain biking and hiking.

title: (27324) Folgoso do Courel - Unnamed Road
description: From here there are several possible routes. Quiet place with incredible views.

title: (27670) Pedrafita do Cebreiro - 1 Avenida Castilla
description: Large parking area used by truckers and motorhomes. Public toilets with hot showers. Picnic benches and grassed area. On edge of small town. Bins available. Fresh water by entrance to parking area, and in town itself.

title: (27413) Rozabales - Lugar Salgueiros
description: Typical furancho with closed farmhouse. Old cellar with space to taste natural wine of its own production. You can also have lunch or dinner typical and homemade products such as sausages, cheese, bread, empanadas... They allow customers to spend the night. Finca shaded by huge oak trees and super quiet. Slightly inclined but it can be corrected with Calzos. Call before or send WhatsApp to inform.

title: (27560) Monterroso - 10 Praza Circular
description: Parking in Plaza do Mayor in Monterroso quiet to spend the night. Suitable for vans up to 6 meters. Parking in playground, opposite bakery and bars and you can walk anywhere

title: (27500) Chantada - 42D Avenida de Lugo
description: Parking very close to the urban center. Although the terrain has some slope, there are flatter areas in which you can park the camper.

title: (27519) Chantada - Avenida dos Pilos
description: Parking very good for a night not far from the city center. When I went for the feria it was perfect.

title: (27560) Monterroso - 25 Avenida da Praia
description: Recreational area attached to the municipal campsite and very in the shade

title: (27515) Chantada - 5 LU-P-1801
description: Iglesia Santa María de Nogueira, Chantada.Lugo Religious paintings somewhat transgressive. It is believed that they were made by artists inspired by the Sistine Chapel. Interesting. Very good for Antonio who acts as a guide on the visit. The road is complicated from Chantada, but we did it with a 7.5 m AC. When you get to the church there is an esplanade.

name: Camping Monterroso
title: (27560) Camping Monterroso
description: Small very nice campsite with restaurant and swimming pool, the river nearby, welcome the quality staff, you choose your location according to the place, predict the calles, no animation, calm and rest guaranteed, sanitary very clean as often in Spain

title: (27153) San Clodio - Unnamed Road
description:
Small parking lot in the City of Ants.
Beautiful and fun walk through this great wonder. Worth visiting.

title: (27438) Ferreira de Pantón - 89 Rúa Ourense
description: Repsol petrol station which has a drinking water tap. The manager is a very nice man with whom we had a good laugh.

title: (27416) - Unnamed Road
description: Small leisure area with tables in the middle of nature. Under Mount Marroxo. You can park and sleep peacefully.

title: (27299) Lugo - 1 Lugar Bandelo
description: Active tourism in rural areas

title: (27500) Chantada - 80 Carretera o Seixo
description: Three level parking spaces at a park with river, sports stadium, playground and toilet. Bakers and restaurants / bars / coffees 10min walk away (along the river).

title: (27438) Ferreira de Pantón -
description: Shady space in front of the wake, next to a small forest.

title: (27438) Ferreira de Pantón - 17 Rúa Escairón

title: (27518) Chantada - 50D Estrada do Seixo
description: drinking water fountain. Access by vehicle is possible up to a few meters away. Therefore only suitable for canisters.

title: (27328) Quiroga - Seara, A

Cascada de Vieiros, where there is parking right there but you can walk from here with a beautiful route. There are no services. You can see sunrise in the morning between the mountains, it's great.

title: (27320) Quiroga - 33 Rúa Miño
description: Self-service “WASH-UP” laundry. 3 sizes of washers and 2 dryers.

title: (27440) Sober - 17D Rúa da Ponte
description: Large car park with around twenty spaces near the main road and a small village. calm and no worries with the neighborhood

title: (27320) Quiroga - 32 Rúa Ánxel Fole
description: Really good playground. Perfect rest stop when travelling with kids. parking on the street. Several benches, restaurant, small football field.

title: (27320) Quiroga - 114C Rúa Real
description: Quiroga hostel parking. We spend about 30 camper / caravans without problems. Without services

description: New area located between a school and a hostel.

title_short: (27310) Ribas de Sil - Camiño da Lama
description: Motorhome area of ​​Ribas de Sil.

title: (27154) Outeiro de Rei - Unnamed Road
description: Ideal parking for hiking next to the river Miño and also to enjoy the Zoo.

title: (27320) Quiroga - 60A Lugar Quiroga
description: There is a beautiful walk along the river. Walking a little further, there is a shady picnic area. Very quiet place on the outskirts of town. You can walk to the town, or from the promenade you can also walk. There are no services, but there is a gas station very close and supermarkets in the town. There is shade to park and the walk is practically all shade. 15 min from the town is the caurel, 50 min the ancares and the ribeira sacra 30 min. An ideal place to stay and visit any of these places. In addition, the Romans were in Quiroga and there are countless things to see: Castillo os Novaes, Montefurado, San Clodio River Walk, Augas Mestas, beautiful waterfalls, La Ermida church, magnificent routes, etc ... We stayed for a week and we made short ... ideal to get up and have breakfast watching the river.

title: (24521) Busmayor - 12A Lugar Busmayor
description: Very quiet place, perfect to visit the Busmayor beech forest. In the town square, next to a playground with tables.

title: (27209) Palas de Rei - Carretera Centro de Salud
title_short: (27209) Palas de Rei - Carretera Centro de Salud
description: Palas de Rei service area, only for services, but you can spend the night in the village.

title: (27657) Lugo - LU-P-3501
description: Overnight and spend the day in an area not frequented and with good views

title: (27133) Baleira - 1 Lugar Degolada
description: Beautiful place on the road to St Jacques In front of a small abandoned church View of the cows. Green route.

title: (24526) Vega de Valcarce - 17 CV-125/1
description:
Quiet small parking space by a small stream.
Ideal for a couple of nights stay.
the village has various cafes and restaurants

title: (27310) - 18 Lugar San Pedro
description: Quiet, shady place on a side street and right on the river

title: (27200) Palas de Rei - 12 Rúa Hortas
description: It is a small plot of land that is the Eroski parking lot. It is open 24 hours and there is a laundry, bars and supermarket at the end of the street. We did not see signs and we spent the night with a small van.

title: (27200) Palas de Rei - 3 Estrada de Quindimil
title_short: (27200) Palas de Rei - 3 Estrada de Quindimil
description: Very wide main street, some traffic.

title: (27460) Sober - 18 Avenida Outeiro
description: Zona de aparcamiento asfaltada para varios vehículos pero en pendiente. Área de picnic pegada a la piscina municipal de Sober. Tiene 3 mesas de picnic, mucha sombra, parque infantil y pista de fútbol/baloncesto. La piscina está remodelándose y por ahora sin acceso.

title: (27200) Palas de Rei - Estrada de Quindimil
title_short: (27200) Palas de Rei - Estrada de Quindimil
description: Very quiet parking area under an old oak tree and other shady trees. There is a picnic area in front. and a highway through little traffic. I took a nap and will come tonight to sleep.

title: (27466) Sober - Lugar de Vilaescura
description: Quiet spot in woods by a lake. Silent and lonely. More practical for campers than for AC.

title: (27657) Trigal - Unnamed Road
description: Very calm. Next to the cemetery.

title: (27150) Santa Isabel - 3 Barro Santa Isabel
description: You have to pay 10 euros for parking. I asked the guy and he told me that only July and August and from Thursday to Sunday. the other days you can be without paying

name: Outeiro de Rei Motorhome Area
title: (27150) Outeiro de Rei Motorhome Area
description: A very quiet area with all services; electricity, water and drainage. The location is confusing because the GPS directs you to a recreational area. (Sta Isabel) You have to follow the GPS indications until you reach an urbanization of chalets and when you get to a Red one you have to turn left, on the right side of that chalets, at the end of that street is the caravan area.

title: (24520) Ruitelán - 40A Carretera Nacional VI
description: Nice place with picnic tables next to a river, it has a fountain with drinking water, a garbage can and a children's area. It is located next to a very quiet road. Space for 6 vans. We spent the night very quiet with hardly any noise.

title: (24525) Balboa - LU-723
description: Small space for 2 or 3 vans, with somewhat difficult access to larger vehicles. Right at the turnoff to Valverde.

title: (27310) Ribas de Sil - LU-P-5301
description: Access to river water

title: (27150) Outeiro de Rei - Rúa E
description: Service station with shower for a fee. It is a 24h service area with restaurant and menu widely used by truckers. You do not have services for campers

title: (27270) Mosteiro - 35 Camino de Cadeite
description: Service area for motorhomes in MOSTEIRO POL Lugo.

title: (27317) Ribas de Sil - LU-P-5301
description: Nice resting place at a lookout point. Definitely also great as a place to stay.

title: (27656) Lugo - 106T Lugar Puebla Navia
description: Picnic area next to the five-a-side football pitch and the River Nava, 1 km from the town center with all kinds of services. It is worth stopping in this town and seeing the bridge, orreo, old town...

title: (27466) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet and wooded picnic area with picnic area and barbecues. Areas with sun and shade ideal to spend the day. There is a fountain but no tap.

title: (27260) Castro de Ribeiras - Parque Empresarial
description: Gas station the cheapest fuel in the province to highlight from this review each pump has a tap to take DRINKING WATER

title: (27220) Friol - 135 Calle Castelos
description:
Farm with almost 1 Ha. of meadow and more than 2,000m2 of forest. 1 km from the town center, in a very quiet area, with no houses around.
In Friol there are all kinds of basic services, a beautiful river promenade and a magnificent public swimming pool (€3).
Nearby places of interest:
Torre S. Paio de Narla: 10 min
Roman Temple of Vault: 15 min
Sobrado dos Monxes Monastery: 20 min
Lugo: 20 min
A Coruña: 1 hour
Santiago: 1 hour
Beaches: 1 hour
O Courel and Os Ancares mountains: 1h 30min
A beautiful hiking route passes through Friol, linking in 2 stages the primitive way to Santiago, in Lugo, with the north way, in Sobrado dos Monxes. It is marked with a green arrow and you can find the track on Wikiloc.

title: (27424) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Parking place for one of the viewpoints two hundred meters away on an easily passable dirt road. Large picnic table, no convenience, 4 parking spaces.

title: (27269) Castro de Rei - 56 Avenida Terra Chá
title_short: (27269) Castro de Rei - 56 Avenida Terra Chá
description: Laundry with hours from 7 a.m. to 11 p.m. from Monday to Sunday, 5 minutes walk from the motorhome area.

title: (27424) Sober - LU-601
description: Quiet place we spent one night in AC and no problem. 3 cars passed in 12 hours. It is right next to a viewpoint

title: (27370) Rábade - 1 Avenida de Vilalba
description: Rábade Self-service Laundry. Wash and dry your clothes.

title: (24520) Vega de Valcarce - 4 Calle Calleja
description: Very quiet parking lot overlooking the city does not match the Google photo. there is a water tap on the left side of the building

title: (27424) - 54 Lugar Doade
description: Location in a restaurant Cantina, in Doade. The owner has an air conditioner and offers space at home to keep his customers. There is enough space for 3-4 motorhomes. The restaurant is also very good, specializing in cod with chestnuts, octopus and meat of Galicia

title: (27424) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to spend a night and enjoy the views of the Sil river. follow indications of mirador do duque

title: (27424) Sober - LU-601
description: Small parking and picnic area next to the viewpoint. Very beautiful panoramic views!

title: (24525) - 19A Lugar Balboa
description: Quiet area next to the cemetery, full of trees, is a free camping area, the road is a bit hidden, better access down Balboa where you can go around.

name: CASTRO RIBEIRAS
title: (27260) CASTRO RIBEIRAS
description: Motorhome area.

title: (27370) Rábade - 40 LU-107
description: Very clean laundromat Free Wifi Exchange of banknotes for coins Sockets to connect the telephone...

title: (27424) Monforte de Lemos - s/n Camino del embarcadero
title_short: (27424) Monforte de Lemos - s/n Camino del embarcadero
description: Next to the road and the piers. Very quiet at night, few cars and with beautiful views.

title: (24521) Barjas - LE-5101
description: Place near a road with hardly any traffic. Not very flat, but if you search, you will find.

title: (32764) A Teixeira - LU-903
description: Online parking next to the road right at the Abeleda pier. It fills up at the departure times of the boats for the Sil river cruise, the rest of the time it is empty because there is nothing else to do in the area. We have spent the quiet night because there are hardly any cars passing by.

title: (32764) Paradela - 18 Lugar de Arriba
description: Possibility to park your van on the access to the viewpoint. Great view.

title: (27424) Doade - LU-903
description: View of the valley of the Sil, can night. No service.

name: Bodegas Regina Viarum
title: (27424) Bodegas Regina Viarum
description: Regina Viarum wineries. Private parking lots of the wineries where parking and overnight stays are allowed upon reservation of a guided tour of the wineries. The parking lot is a bit steep but it is acceptable. There are no services. These initiatives are appreciated, since the area does not offer many alternatives given the orography. Spectacular views and a very quiet night. 100% recommendable to spend the night and the next day to visit the wineries first thing in the morning. It is recommended to reserve and advise that we are going in AC in case there is any temporary limitation in access to the parking lot since it is a vineyard with activity.

title: (27220) Friol - 1 Praza Andón Cebreiro
description: Parking in the main town square. Supermarket across the street. Bank at 30 meters. Civil Guard 50 meters. Restaurants. Hardware store. Beautiful river passage a hundred meters. You could also park

title: (27424) Sober - LU-903
description: At the end of the road just before the viewpoint with an exceptional view. Van access only

title: (27226) Friol - LU-233
description:
Large and level esplanade next to the municipal market of Friol (Lugo). A 5-minute walk from the town, where all kinds of services are found. River walk and Roman castro (O Friulio) very close.
We spent the night on a Saturday night alone and very quiet; there was no market on Sunday, but it may be noisier and busier any other day of the week.

title: (27276) Baleira - CP-54-03
description: Leisure area with tables and next to a river suitable for swimming.

name: Bodega Val da Lenda
title: (27423) Bodega Val da Lenda
description: Family winery Val Da Lenda in the heart of the Ribeira Sacra. It is allowed to stay overnight at the farm to visit the cellar or buy its rich wines and pomace. No Services. Natural environment close to tourist attractions (monasteries, viewpoints, Ribeira Sacra train ride, cities, etc.). Exceptional reception. Victor, the owner, surprises with his approachability and genuine friendliness. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

name: Solpor Camper Park
title: (27425) Solpor Camper Park
description:
Area in the heart of the Ribeira Sacra with an infinity pool and breathtaking mountain views in an incomparable natural environment, surrounded by natural, cultural and wine tourism resources. Bakery service, possibility to order meals, small shop with local products. Come visit us and discover the Ribeira Sacra by motorhome. 
Reception opening hours: 10:30-14:30 / 16:30-20:30

title: (27274) Pol - 34 Lugar Rioxoan
description: A nice place to stop to rest and eat, quiet area although some traffic influx, the place is clean and in good condition

title: (27422) Sober -
description: One of the most beautiful points of view, that of Santiorxo, in Doade. Surrounded by pines, with some benches that overlook the canyons of the river Sil and the vineyards.

title: (32764) O Pombar - 51 Aldea O Pombar
description:
Esplanade at the exit of the town.
Very quiet place to spend the night.
From here you can take the bus to access the piers.
There are two wineries and a Casa Lelo restaurant where you can have lunch or dinner very, very well homemade food and good service.

title: () Feira -
description: Perfect place to be and sleep. Super quiet and with some huge stones. Routes start from here, beautiful forest.

title: () Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Impressive place in the middle of nature, total tranquility, and also with a taperia that is eaten very well and with wines from its own winery and from the area, also speaking with the owner who is a very friendly person, gives electricity and Water

title: (32764) A Teixeira - 51 Aldea a Boga
description: Recreational area in the village

title: (27423) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Outside area of a secondary road little traveled. Next to a viewpoint overlooking the river Sil. Practically flat. If you get the night is a good alternative. Warehouse area very interesting.

title: (27438) O Torrón - 101 N-120a
description: Spectacular views. Very quiet area next to a road with no traffic. Without services. Not very plain. On the road that leaves the parking lot, you are in the town of Peares in 25 m.

title: (27425) Vales -
description: Quiet place in the woods next to a lookout.

title: (27460) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: The location next to RambitaLopez is not available. At the top of that location we have this parking lot where you can spend the night and contemplate the Cañón do Sil. We spent the night with two campers and a house truck. 100% recommendable.

title: (32449) A Peroxa - Unnamed Road
description: Train station in Os Peares, bar during the day and bathrooms that stayed open at night, the woman at the bar super friendly, very quiet at night since the station hardly works.

title: (27460) O Arroxó - Unnamed Road
description:
A beautiful, very quiet place to meditate.
At night it is spectacular how the stars look. 100% recommended

title: (27460) Sober - Unnamed Road
description: Lookout with views of the canyon. Flat parking suitable for motorhome. Very quiet to sleep. Further down, jetty and kayak. Awesome place. Highly recommended.

title: (27377) Cospeito - 53 LU-113
description: Simple shady parking and along the river a few kilometers from Lugo. Accessible to vehicles of all sizes.

title: (32164) Vilar - Mirador de la Presa de San Estevo
title_short: (32164) Vilar - Mirador de la Presa de San Estevo
description: Parking at the Mirador de la Presa de San Estevo. Just above the dam. Flat, tarmac car park with spaces for long vehicles. Beautiful views of this part of the Sil Canyon. Roadside but little traffic. Two small viewpoints with information boards and benches.

address.street: Mirador de la Presa de San Estevo
